sentence.Network_en: A few are dim-witted drones, but most are talented, frustrated, wasted people.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几个是愚笨的寄生虫，但是大多数是有才能却不得志而自暴自弃的人。

sentence.Network_en: The man proved to be deaf as well as dim - witted, for his mumbled answers were quite irrelevant.
sentence.Network_cn: 那老僧既聋且昏,又齿落舌钝,所答非所问.

sentence.Network_en: For example, an evil wizard polymorphs his dim - witted hireling into a crow.
sentence.Network_cn: 举例说, 一个邪恶的法师对他的雇工施展变形奶牛的法术.

每个人心中都有一只麦兜- 双语新闻 -... ... clumsy 笨拙的 dim-witted 笨的,傻的 martial arts 武术（指功夫、柔道、空手道等）.
中英对照注释《红楼梦》第二回_a978365_新浪博客 ... casually 偶然的随意的 dim-witted 昏瞶的 enterprise 事业心.

list.abs: always the odd-man-out , this dim-witted blue moose all heart and all thumbs .永远的幸存者，这头蓝色的笨笨驼鹿总是全心全意地笨手笨脚。

entry.def: If you describe someone as dim-witted, you are saying in quite an unkind way that you do not think they are very clever.

means.word_mean: 1. lacking mental capacity and devoid of subtlety

auth_sentence.content: The lighting was dim; the water piping hot.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lighting was dim; the water piping hot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lighting was dim; the water piping hot.

auth_sentence.content: The faded moon Made a dim, silver twilight.

auth_sentence.content: Sainsbury's takes a dim view of such conduct.
